snippet.description: Enable OpenType features. Supported OpenType tags: c2pc, c2sc, calt, case, cpsp, cswh, dlig, frac, liga, lnum, onum, ordn, pnum, rlig, sinf, smcp, ss01, ss02, ss03, ss04, ss05, ss06, ss07, ss08, ss09, ss10, ss11, ss12, ss13, ss14, ss15, ss16, ss17, ss18, ss19, ss20, subs, sups, swsh, titl, tnum. A resetFeatures argument can be set to True in order to get back to the default state.
